<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"> <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <access>package_private</access> <active>true</active> <api_name>global.ActivityUtils</api_name> <caller_access/> <client_callable>false</client_callable> <description>Gets installed as part of "com.snc.activity_subscriptions" plugin Activity Subscriptions Framework. It contains util methods for the Activity Subscriptions Framework.</description> <name>ActivityUtils</name> <script><![CDATA[var ActivityUtils = Class.create(); ActivityUtils.prototype = Object.extendsObject(ActivityUtilsSNC, { initialize: function() { ActivityUtilsSNC.prototype.initialize.call(this); },
type: 'ActivityUtils' });]]></script> <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2020-02-17 13:02:21</sys_created_on> <sys_id>3737109d3b0700109381266914efc4a3</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>3</sys_mod_count> <sys_name>ActivityUtils</sys_name> <sys_package display_value="Subscriptions and Activity Feed Framework" source="com.snc.activity_subscriptions">7427f20f2f400110d8a4d5f62799b6eb</sys_package> <sys_policy/> <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope> <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_3737109d3b0700109381266914efc4a3</sys_update_name> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2020-02-20 07:05:56</sys_updated_on> <u_script_length>222</u_script_length> </sys_script_include> </record_update>
